item.title: Courses and teaching material
item.description:
I have taught the following courses:

  • teaching assistant for the PhD course “Mathematical methods for Microeconomics” (lecturer: Andreas Hefti)
  • teaching assistant for the undergraduate course “Market Design” (lecturer: Marek Pycia)
  • teaching assistant for the course “Intorduction to Microeconomics” (lecturer: Ernst Fehr)
  • teaching assistant for the undergraduate course “Introduction to Macroeconomics” (lecturer: Christian Hepenstrick)
  • teaching assistant for the undergraduate course “Introduction to Game Theory” (lecturer: Samuel Haefner)

I designed the following teaching materials for the Economic Education Program of the Swiss National Bank:

  • “How to invest and trade online”
  • “The economics behind Big Tech companies”

Excerpts from student evaluations:

“Highly motivated and competent TA”

“Very structured and clear presentations. Great instructor!”

“Highly competent TA, patient with students, open to questions and great at explaining complicated material.”
